name: Amulet of Time: Shadow of La Rochelle
name_original: Amulet of Time: Shadow of La Rochelle
description: When the ghost of the beautiful Diane de Poitiers appears in front of you, you are transported back in time in "Amulet of Time: Shadow of la Rochelle"! Make a trip back in time to the middle of the 16th century to explore France and an incredible love story in this amazing Hidden Object Adventure game.  Reveal the mysteries behind the King’s assassination and uncover a conspiracy against the king's mistress and protect her to return to the present.
